mapper.select: SELECT id, contractcode, userid, startdate, enddate, contracttype, istrainingagreement, remark FROM tb_hr_contractinformation WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_hr_contractinformation (id, contractcode, userid, startdate, enddate, contracttype, istrainingagreement, remark) VALUES (NULL , #{contractcode}, #{userid}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{contracttype}, #{istrainingagreement}, #{remark})
